properties.areaDesc: Mexico Bay NY to the St. Lawrence River; Niagara River to Hamlin Beach NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 20 at 6:21AM EST until January 21 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 knots and waves 3 to 6 feet
expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from the Niagara
River to Hamlin Beach and nearshore waters of Lake Ontario
from Mexico Bay to the Saint Lawrence River.

* WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 4 AM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EST TUESDAY
